component.description: Delegates to org.apache.maven.lifecycle.mapping.LifecycleMapping with role-hint of 'abstract-plugin', effectively aliasing that component, so a single lifecycle mapping component can be used for multiple apps with minimal effort, as long as those apps adhere to the common plugin layout.
Provides a custom artifact handler to map the 'nexus-plugin' dependency type and POM packaging to the 'jar' file extension in the Maven repository.

Map in Nexus-specific directory layouts, application defaults, etc. for the app-lifecycle mojos to use. This allows the mojos to remain general in nature, without needing to know anything about the application being built directly.
